_header: Our king went forth to Normandy
_description: The Agincourt Carol — six 5-line stanzas (aaaab) including refrain: ‘Deo gracias’, and burden (cc): ‘Deo gracias Anglia / Redde pro victoria’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Owre kynge went forth to NormandyWith grace & myȝt of
                    chyualry…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines: …Tyl he come to agincourt costeDeo gracias
BodArcSelB26.Note: A transcript is Cambridge UK,  Magdalene College Pepys 2505 (a loose leaf).

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
Our kyng went forth to normundyWyth grace & myth of
                    chyualry…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…And ȝeue hem grace withoutyn endyngÞan may we calle
                    & sauely syngDeo gracias
